name: Eye-of-the-Inferno
description:
Preview of game to propose future long term development. Currently has 1 level with barebones functionality. Note that embedded (webGL) does not have fire VFX due to performance issues.

Experience being in the "eye of the storm" by surviving in the center of a chaotic burning world.  Enjoy fast-paced twin-stick action gameplay through an auto-firing bullet heaven experience! Defeat large amounts of enemies to protect different objectives and gain strength to surmount the Inferno!
